furniture.name: The Legend Plaque
furniture.description: It takes a legend to become a legend. Good job!

furniture.name: Crimsonfish Plaque
furniture.description: One step closer to being an angler master!

furniture.name: Angler Plaque
furniture.description: The hunter is now the hunted!

furniture.name: Glacierfish Plaque
furniture.description: All those long hours with frozen snot finally paid off!

furniture.name: Mutant Carp Plaque
furniture.description: What were you doing in the sewers? Why was this in the sewers? Why did you hang it up on the wall? I'm sure it smells...
